name: Penguin Karts
description: Penguin Karts is a battle racing game, where drivers race against each other and compete for prizes and in-game swag. The platform will feature a secondary marketplace where players can buy and sell items they earn in-game. Penguin Karts will deploy on the Fantom ecosystem which has the most robust set of play-to-earn tools available for games. PGK is the native utility token that is used for: *Unlocks the in-game marketplace for players to buy and sell items for tokens *skins *gear *collectibles *swag In addition to the utility for the fungible tokens, the NFTs have an added layer of utility for staking. Staking the Penguin Kart 2D NFT will earn 3D NFT rewards claimable on the Fantom chain.
